Name: De Waard
Review Text: Nice setting with comfortable couch like sitting on parts of it. Our waitress was great, friendly and helpful . She recommended an Indonesian restaurant for our dinner. We had asked at the beginning and forgotten, but she did not. The food was good for a relaxing mid day lunch

Review Text: Well nice and lovely place.  Service was very fast and good,  we got drinks in 5 minutes.  Then food took like 15 min. We were impressed with food quality,  everything tasted delicious and looked so good.  Lunch for 4 people cost us ‚Ç¨63.  Which is good for food quality you get.
